```{r setup, include=FALSE}
getModel <- function(vars, df) {
  source("~/R/terni/f_makeSpline.R")

  ms <- makeSpline(vars) %>% paste(collapse = " + ")
  
  ms <- paste("gam(value ~ ", ms, ", gamma=1.4, family=gaussian(link=log), data = df)")
  
  mod <- eval(parse(text = ms))
  return(mod)
}

getSign <- function(mod) {
  summary(mod)$s.table %>% 
    as.data.frame() %>% 
    filter(`p-value` < 0.05) %>% 
    rownames() -> v_sign
  return(v_sign)
}

df <- read_csv("~/R/terni/data/dataframes/df_finale_lod.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
df %>% mutate(
  TOT_CR = Biomass_Burning_CR + Soil_Dust_CR + Steel_Plant_CR + Road_Dust_CR + Brake_Dust_CR,
  TOT_NCR = Biomass_Burning_NCR + Soil_Dust_NCR + Steel_Plant_NCR + Road_Dust_NCR + Brake_Dust_NCR
) -> df
```


# CR

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}

modelli_cr <- readRDS("~/R/terni/rds_indici/TOT_CR.rds")

index <- grep("TOT_CR", names(df))
names(df)[index] <- "value"
mod_cr <- getModel(names(modelli_cr), df)

gamtabs(mod_cr, type = "HTML")

cat("\n\n R²:", summary(mod_cr)$r.sq %>% round(3), "\n\n")

appraise(mod_cr) %>% print()

draw(mod_cr)
```


# CR (clean)

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}

v_sign <- getSign(mod_cr)
lapply(v_sign, \(v) gsub("s\\(|\\)", '', v)) %>% unlist() -> v_sign

mod_cr_clean <- getModel(v_sign, mod_cr$model) 

gamtabs(mod_cr_clean, type = "HTML")

cat("\n\n R²:", summary(mod_cr_clean)$r.sq %>% round(3), "\n\n")

appraise(mod_cr_clean) %>% print()

draw(mod_cr_clean)
```
